contest-event.event-date:
March 29, 1980 D Welsh Area Championship (Third Section)
Welsh Area Championship (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Welsh Area Championship welsh-area-championship-third-section
None Wales
Third
Main Street
Brangwyn Hall, Swansea, Swansea County, Wales, UK Due to a dispute with the National organiser, in 1980 the Welsh area was run unofficially, without accreditation to the national contest. The 1979 Welsh section winners were invited to the 1980 finals. An account of events and the dispute is given at http://www.4barsrest.com/articles/2010/1102.asp?l=in#.Wh3ZQVVl-Uk.
